ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow - o - wow
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe, my bard has red eyes as a DE, ugly sob. you lucky, i want that mask and the lizzie one. Congrats on levelin hally. I planned on getting massive xp this
ygData.messageBody:
hehe, my bard has red eyes as a DE, ugly sob.

you lucky, i want that mask and the lizzie one. Congrats on levelin hally. I
planned on getting massive xp this weekend (long hours) but my connection
was horrible, i kept crashing every 5-10 minutes. I ended up getting only a
quarter bub through the whole weekend. The spikes resided a wee bit sunday
and i was able to go to felwithe and raise my swimming skill while i went
grocerie shopping. Went from 116 to 186 just singing jig to keep stamina up.
gotta love those gloves in a sick and disturbing way.

On the bright side, i never go to faymart and i logged in this morning to
try to get a gate to lava, couldnt find one so i went and got a shackle from
the hero (what a wuss). That made my weekend/day. Spare bracer woot!

Minkin
Sol ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: October 30, 2000 5:00 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Wow - o - wow


Well twinkie bardette had a good weekend! I am finally a mana-battery!
*cheers*

Also got her an erudite mask and thank god its a good face cuz Tani's guise
gives her the ugliest DE face (Hally has the second ugliest!) so I'm glad I
got a good one for a change! [insert anti-twink comments here]

For those of you looking for good xp in the early 30s, try the giant
fortress in Frontier Mountains... its OMG good xp. We had a balanced group
(31 bard, 31 monk, 34 warrior, 27 cleric) and pretty much fought nonstop.
Set up shop right inside. Got just over a bubble an hour but you gotta
watch out for those Mountain Giant Craigs (ouch!).

Did anyone participate in the ToT finals on test? Hear they were great
fights!!! My guild got bumped out after a couple rounds to a PvP team but
weere still happy :)

Hope everyone had a good weekend :)

Tani, 32nd Bardette-mana-battery
Halana, 57th Shaman
Solusek Ro


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
